sentence.Network_en: She is regarded as the best tragedian on the English stage.
sentence.Network_cn: 她被认为是英国戏剧舞台上最出色的悲剧演员.

sentence.Network_en: In the ancient society , she was destined to be a tragedian.
sentence.Network_cn: 晴雯一生有关男女情感之出入, 唯宝玉而已,洁身自爱,未曾逾越伦常.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a writer of tragedies): from Old French tragediane, from tragedie (see tragedy)

means.word_mean: 1. a writer (especially a playwright) who writes tragedies
2. an actor who specializes in tragic roles

auth_sentence.content: As Aeschylus, the exalted Greek tragedian, noted in the fifth century b.c.
